'''Ecofeminism''' is a [[Biocentrism|biocentric]] [[Environmentalism|environmental]] movement with [[Culture|cultural]] and [[Society|social]] concerns. The movement believes that a relationship exists between the [[oppression]] of [[Woman|women]] and the degradation of [[Natural environment|nature]]. Ecofeminist theorists consider the interconnections between [[sexism]], the [[Dominator culture|domination of nature]], [[racism]], and other social inequalities.

==Notable ecofeminist novels== * [[The Fifth Sacred Thing]] by [[Starhawk]] * [[The Gate to Women's Country]] by [[Sheri S.
